Functions
Clear_Transition_Name_Annot_Click
Public Sub Clear_Transition_Name_Annot_Click()
Description

Function that controls what happens when the following button is left clicked.

The following pop up box will appear. Asking the users which column to clear.

Load_Transition_Name_ISTD_Click
Public Sub Load_Transition_Name_ISTD_Click()
Description

Function that controls what happens when the following button is left clicked.

The program will first verify if all the ISTD are valid.

If not all are valid, the following message box will appear and the program will stop

If there are no entries in the Transition_Name_ISTD column, the following message will appear

If all entries in the Transition_Name_ISTD column are valid, the program will transfer the entries to the Transition_Name_ISTD column in ISTD_Annot sheet with its duplicates removed.

Validate_ISTD_Click
Public Sub Validate_ISTD_Click(Optional ByVal MessageBoxRequired As Boolean = True, _
                               Optional ByVal Testing As Boolean = False)
Description

Function that controls what happens when the following button is left clicked.

The program will first load entries from the Transition_Annot and the Transition_Annot_ISTD column.

It will first check if these columns are empty or not.

The following message box will appear if both columns are empty.

The following message box will appear if only the Transition_Annot column is empty.

The following message box will appear if only the Transition_Annot_ISTD column is empty.

Next, it uses the function Transition_Name_Annot.Verify_ISTD to verify if the ISTD is valid.

Input is valid if the entires can also be found in the column Transition_Annot

See this function documentation for more information

Parameters
MessageBoxRequired As Boolean

When set to True, the following pop up boxes will appear

Testing As Boolean

When set to False, after the function is used, it will exit the program as this function is meant to be run alone or as a last/final step.  When set to True, after the function is used, it will exit the function and other functions can be called

Get_Transition_Array_Click
Public Sub Get_Transition_Array_Click()
Description

Function that controls what happens when the following button is left clicked.

The following pop up box will appear. Asking the users which raw file to load.

Click on "Open" and the transition names from the raw data will automatically be loaded

Get_Transition_Array_Tidy_Click
Public Sub Get_Transition_Array_Tidy_Click()
Description

Function that controls what happens when the following button is left clicked.

The following pop up box will appear. Asking the users which tabular data file to load.

Correct usage are summarised as follows
